Text.val: -- Author: Stephan Huppertz
15.10.2012 SH SCR17574 BXA715F/M Changed Blob Ansi to Unicode blob (INRM)
11.10.2012 SH SCR17574 BXA715B (2 tasks): Changed Blob Ansi to Unicode blob (DUNH)
13.03.2012 GB SCR17173 Update the DUNH_METHOD, DUNH_RECIPIENT_TEXT, DUNH_DESCRIPTION in the BXA715B UpdateDUNH (separate task)
10.12.2011 GB SCR16960 Added update the <disputedesc> with the INVO_TEXT if no INRM row
28.07.2011 SH SCR16635 BXA715F NA1 Extended BPIV_INVO_INVOICENO to alpha 20
for sort on INVO and XML output
07.02.2011 GB SCR16212 Changed value of update the DUNH_DOCTYPE (BXA715B)
22.06.2010 GB SCR15598 Changed selection for DEBTOR_CLIENT
09.11.2009 GB SCR15040 Added two parameter PI.ADMNO, PI.CLNTNO
31.08.2009 SH SCR14860 BXA715B Extended update DUNH_USERID with
DEBC_EMP_HANDLING if <> blank instead BID706.PO.USRID
28.08.2009 SH SCR14832 BXA715K Added BDC151 PI.LEVEL and PO.NIHIL_CREDITLIMIT
13.07.2009 GB SCR14733 Extended condition for selection (BXA715F)
10.07.2009 SH SCR14690 BXA715F Set <disputcode> to blank if 0
11.06.2009 AK SCR14690 Fixed bug in <disputcode> tag
20.04.2009 GB SCR14563 Changed update the DUNH_REMARKPRESENT from Y to N
15.04.2009 SH SCR14543 BXA715F/M Added <admin_number> and <client_number> and
changed date pictures in YYYY-MM-DD for XML output for NA1, NA2, NA3

... use lowest dates

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(INVO_AACTUALI) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 and days(':3') - days(INVO_DUEDATE) between 60 and 89 for fetch only
select cast(sum(INVO_AACTUALI) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/INVO where INVO_DEBC_NO = :2 and INVO_AACTUALI <> 0 and days(':3') - days(INVO_DUEDATE) > 89 for fetch only

Text.val: -- Build final XML File
... copy the header file to final file. If we don't do that, AS/400 will choose
system default fo CCSID (EBCDIC) if we later on append with cat >>
to a non-existing (new) final file ...
-- Copy final XML File to tamino queue
-- Copy final XML File failed
-- PC Message (Online)
-- AS400 Message (Batch)
-- Only if FinalFile was copied to TaminoQueue by UFB523

SQL_STMT_U.val: select integer(left(trim(INVO_DEBC_DEBC),3)), min(INVO_DEBC_NO) from :1/INRM join :1/INVO on INVO_NO = INRM_INVO_NO join :1/DEBC on DEBC_NO = INVO_DEBC_NO and DEBC_DCGR_GROUPNO > 0 :3 join :1/CLNT on CLNT101_ADMNO = DEBC_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = DEBC_CLNTNO and CLNT103_COMM_ADMNO = 1 and CLNT103_COMM_CLNTNO = 1636 where INRM_DATE = ':2' group by integer(left(trim(INVO_DEBC_DEBC),3)) order by integer(left(trim(INVO_DEBC_DEBC),3)) for fetch only

Text.val: -- Selection of distinct Olympia offices (pos.1-3 indicates the Olympia office)
A new XML files has to be created for every office
-- Get first debtor client inside the selected debtor group
-- Transaction level = selected Olympia office, see DSQL
-- Build filename for temporary XML Files
-- Build final filename for the XML File
... update DUNH_USRID

SQL_STMT_U.val: select INVO_NO, INVO_ADMNO, INVO_CLNTNO, INVO_DEBC_NO, INVO_DEBC_DEBC, INVO_INVOICENO, INVO_INVDATE, INVO_DUEDATE, INVO_AACTUALI, INVO_DISPUTETYPE from :1/INRM join :1/INVO on INVO_NO = INRM_INVO_NO and left(trim(INVO_DEBC_DEBC),3)= ':2' join :1/DEBC on DEBC_NO = INVO_DEBC_NO and DEBC_DCGR_GROUPNO > 0 :4 join :1/CLNT on CLNT101_ADMNO = DEBC_ADMNO and CLNT102_CLNTNO = DEBC_CLNTNO and CLNT103_COMM_ADMNO = 1 and CLNT103_COMM_CLNTNO = 1636 where INRM_DATE = ':3' order by INVO_DEBC_DEBC, INVO_INVOICENO for fetch only

ExpSyntax.val: 'Bijgaand een excel bestand met alle nieuwe disputen die door de national accounts zijn aangeleverd'

to a non-existing (new) final file ...
